DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy safety cashew apple extract weight management associate metabolic risk factor overweight/obese volunteer , versus placebo , 12 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Cashew Apple Extract Weight Management Associated Metabolic Risk Factors Overweight/Obese Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 27 ≤ BMI ≤ 35 kg/m² Abdominal obesity Acceptance adhere diet physical activity recommendation maintain global lifestyle habit Stable body weight ( < 5 % variation ) within last 3 month prior screen Allergy nut product thereof allergy mango fruit Type I II diabetes Smokers Severe chronic disease History bariatric surgery eat disorder Use weight management product medication could affect nutrient absorption , lipid carbohydrate metabolism
